meanings.definition: relating to the tectum of the midbrain
meanings.sent1: The tectal area of the midbrain is crucial for processing visual information.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the tectal region to understand brain functions better.
meanings.sent3: The tectal neurons had a party in the midbrain, celebrating their important role.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a tectal puzzle, piecing together visual cues effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The tectal connection in the brain lit up like a star, guiding her through the darkness.
